title: New Client - Kicked out of champ select
body:
Had a message pop up after i pressed lock in, it then proceeded to kick me out of champion select

There was no penalty to getting another game

replies.body: Have you seen the issue again? This may have been the problem: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/katKn65c-resolved-connection-issues-245-pm-23rd-nov
